faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SpicyQuiz.
faq.a1: SpicyQuiz is a couples quiz that helps you and your partner discover shared desires. You each take the quiz separately, answering honestly about your interests. Then, we compare your answers and only show you the things you BOTH said yes to. This way, neither partner feels embarrassed about desires that aren't mutual.
faq.q2: Can my partner see my individual answers?
faq.a2: No! Your individual answers are completely private. Only mutual matches (where both partners said yes) are ever revealed. If you said yes to something but your partner didn't, that information stays hidden forever.
faq.q3: Is my data private and secure?
faq.a3: Absolutely. We take privacy very seriously. No account is required, all data is encrypted in transit, and we automatically delete all sensitive information after 90 days. We never share your data with anyone.
faq.q4: How long does the quiz take?
faq.a4: The quiz takes about 10 minutes per person. There are 110 questions across 10 categories, covering everything from basics to more adventurous topics.
faq.q5: Why do I have to pay to see all results?
faq.a5: We show you a preview of your matches for free. The small fee helps us keep the service running, maintain privacy standards, and continue improving the quiz. It's a one-time payment, not a subscription.
faq.q6: What if we don't have any matches?
faq.a6: Don't worry! Having fewer matches in certain categories is completely normal. It doesn't mean anything is wrong with your relationship. The quiz is meant to help you discover new things, not judge your compatibility.
faq.a7: Yes! You can start a new quiz anytime. People's preferences can change over time, so feel free to retake the quiz periodically to discover new shared interests.
faq.a8: Yes, both partners must be 18 years or older to take the quiz. By starting the quiz, you confirm that you meet this requirement.
faq.q9: What does the anatomy selection do?
faq.a9: The anatomy selection helps us customize certain questions to be more relevant to you and your partner. Some questions may be phrased differently based on anatomy for clarity.
faq.a10: A match occurs when both partners answer 'Sure' or 'Yes!' to the same question. Both of you need to show positive interest for it to count as a match.
faq.hereToHelp: We're here to help! Reach out to us anytime.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text: By accessing and using SpicyQuiz ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service.
terms.section2Text: You must be at least 18 years old to use this Service. By using SpicyQuiz, you confirm that you are 18 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect information from anyone under 18.
terms.section3Text: SpicyQuiz is a couples compatibility quiz that helps partners discover shared interests and desires. The Service compares answers between two consenting adults and reveals only mutual matches.
terms.section4Text: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your information. By using the Service, you consent to our data practices as described in the Privacy Policy.
terms.section5List1: Use the Service for any unlawful purpose
terms.section5List2: Share quiz links with anyone other than your consenting partner
terms.section5List3: Attempt to access another user's data
terms.section5List4: Interfere with or disrupt the Service
terms.section5List5: Use automated systems to access the Service
terms.section6Text: Payment is required to unlock full quiz results. All payments are processed securely through our payment provider. Due to the immediate delivery of digital content, refunds are generally not provided. If you experience technical issues, please contact us.
terms.section7Text: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. SpicyQuiz is for entertainment purposes only and should not be considered relationship advice. We are not responsible for any decisions made based on quiz results.
terms.section8Text: To the fullest extent permitted by law, SpicyQuiz shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the Service.
terms.section9Text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.section10Text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.overviewText: We take your privacy seriously. SpicyQuiz is designed with privacy as a core principle. Only mutual matches (where both partners indicated interest) are ever revealed. Your individual answers remain completely private.
privacy.dataCollected1: Names or nicknames you provide (optional identifiers)
privacy.dataCollected4: Basic usage data to improve the service
privacy.dataUse1: To compare answers and find mutual matches
privacy.dataUse2: To process payments for unlocking results
privacy.dataUse3: To improve our quiz questions and user experience
privacy.dataUse4: We do NOT sell or share your personal data with third parties
privacy.dataUse5: We do NOT use your data for targeted advertising
privacy.securityText: Your quiz answers are stored securely and all communication is encrypted using HTTPS. Individual answers are never shown to your partner - only mutual matches are revealed. Non-matches remain completely private forever.
privacy.retentionText: Quiz data is automatically deleted after 90 days for privacy and security reasons. You can request immediate deletion of your data by contacting us.
privacy.cookiesText: We use minimal cookies required for the quiz to function properly. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics that identify individual users.
privacy.paymentText: Payments are processed securely by Stripe. We never see or store your full credit card number. Stripe's privacy policy applies to payment data.
privacy.ageText: This service is intended for adults 18 years and older only. By using SpicyQuiz, you confirm that you are at least 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from anyone under 18.
privacy.rights2: Request deletion of your data at any time
privacy.rights4: Know what data we have about you
privacy.thirdPartyIntro: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.contactText: For privacy-related questions or data deletion requests, please visit our
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
